DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to determine the efficacy and safety of an investigational drug in patients with benign prostatic hyperplasia.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of an Investigational Study Drug for Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia (0906-140)
DOC.criteria: Patients with benign prostatic hyperplasia Patients who are suspected to be suffering from prostatic cancer
